rows.label: qst002302_msg0002
rows.name:
Mmmhmm, twenty-three guards
on watch at night... Thank
you for the information, mo.

rows.label: qst002302_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh, Moruru-san. Are you
plotting something again?

rows.label: qst002302_msg0004
rows.name: Mo mo?! N-not at all, mo!

rows.label: qst002302_msg0005
rows.name:
Moruru is here because he
wishes to hear about
Marveni-sama's wonderful ideas, mo.

rows.label: qst002302_msg0006
rows.name: In that case, it is fine...

rows.label: qst002302_msg0007
rows.name:
By the way, how about having these
people deliver the item I mentioned
earlier to Maurcio-san?

rows.label: qst002302_msg0008
rows.name: A-are you really going to do it, mo?

rows.label: qst002302_msg0009
rows.name: Otherwise, the path will not open.

rows.label: qst002302_msg0011
rows.name:
Everyone, I have one
more favor to ask, mo.

rows.label: qst002302_msg0012
rows.name:
I need you to deliver this
Platinum Music Box to Maurcio
at Goth Isut Port, mo.

rows.label: qst002302_msg0014
rows.name:
Moruru-san, your future
will be a divine one.
